SEARCH
Package Game.Gun

Class Gun

java.lang.Object
Game.Gun.Weapon
Game.Gun.Gun
All Implemented Interfaces:
GamePublisher, IBehaviour
Direct Known Subclasses:
Pistol, Rifle
public class Gun extends Weapon implements GamePublisher
Represents a generic gun weapon with ammo, reloading, and shooting logic. Extends Weapon and provides bullet firing and reload mechanics.

  • Constructor Details

    • Gun

      public Gun(IGameObject owner, String name, double bulletSpeed, double damage, double fireRate, double reloadTime, int magazineSize, int maxAmmo, double distanceFromOwner)
      Constructs a gun with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      owner - the owning game object
      name - weapon name
      bulletSpeed - speed of the bullet
      damage - damage per shot
      fireRate - shots per second
      reloadTime - time to reload
      magazineSize - bullets per magazine
      maxAmmo - maximum ammo
      distanceFromOwner - distance from owner to orbit
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if magazineSize or maxAmmo is not positive

    • shoot

      public boolean shoot()
      Attempts to shoot a bullet from the gun.
      Overrides:
      shoot in class Weapon
      Returns:
